QuestData.Title: A Scarlet Letter
QuestData.Description: Lieutenant Gebler:$b$bHow curious that you would decide to take a prisoner... an undead one at that. What were you thinking? Do you think that, just because of the prisoner's former status, that she would be above the edicts of the Scarlet Crusade?$b$bThis is most troubling, Gebler. I would remind you that there are penalties for such behavior. I command you to execute the prisoner at once. She is no longer one of us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the prisoner in Scarlet Palisade.
QuestData.CompletionText: A letter? What does it say?
QuestData.RewardText: The Scarlet Crusade takes no prisoners. That they would do so with this young woman... curious.$b$bThe powers that you describe are even more curious. She passed through the bars of her prison and killed her captor? Why hadn't she done that in the first place?
